name: Margherita
description: A timeless classic honoring Queen Margherita of Italy. This pizza is an uncomplicated blend of simple and fresh ingredients: tangy San Marzano tomatoes, a hefty layer of creamy mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil on our perfect pizza dough.

name: Pepperoni
description: America's favorite pizza topping takes center stage here. Our pepperoni pizza is a delicious carnival of crispy, curling pepperoni slices atop a layer of melted mozzarella cheese, and our secret recipe tomato sauce. Every bite is a bold taste of the traditional.

name: Hawaii
description: The controversial pizza that you can't help but love. The Hawaii pizza is the perfect harmony of sweet pineapple chunks and savory ham pieces, all topped with melt-in-your-mouth mozzarella on our golden-brown pizza dough. It's the tropical vacation your taste buds didn't know they needed.

name: BBQ Chicken
description: A hearty and flavor-packed option, our BBQ Chicken pizza is smothered in a sweet and tangy BBQ sauce, then topped with grilled chicken, red onions, a blend of cheddar and mozzarella cheeses, and finished with a sprinkle of fresh cilantro. It's a backyard BBQ flavor that fits on a pizza.

name: Quattro Formagio
description: A cheese lover's dream, the Quattro Formaggi is generously topped with a blend of four distinct cheeses. Creamy mozzarella, tangy blue cheese, rich cheddar, and delicate ricotta unite to create a pizza that is indulgently cheesy and irresistibly flavorful.

name: Al Tonno
description: A staple in Italian pizzerias, our Al Tonno pizza comes with a rich tomato sauce base, topped with tender tuna chunks, sweet onions, capers, and a layer of melted mozzarella cheese. A deliciously different kind of pizza that tuna lovers will appreciate.

name: Frutti di Mare
description: For those who can't get enough of the sea's bounty, the Frutti di Mare pizza is a luxurious spread of assorted seafood on a pizza. Fresh clams, tender squid, succulent shrimp, and mussels, all atop a base of tomato sauce and finished with a layer of bubbling mozzarella. It's like a trip to the seaside, in pizza form.
